Body: Description: Hi Support, Customer is setting up SMTP connection with EPP for email alerts. He need the IP address to be allowed in my SMTP server. So can you please provide what is the IP address that is going to connect to customer's SMTP server for email sending ? URL: https://awkb43e.hosted.endpointprotector.com/ Also this IP address, is it dedicated or common/shared IP address ? Thanks in advance. Regards, Milan Singh
What We've Learned Updated: Customer is asking what is the IP address that the EPP server's going to use to connect to their SMTP server for mail sending.
Next Steps Updated: Will have to get this with the DevOps team and get back to them.
